name: Foldup
description:
Foldup is a charming origami-themed paper world. You play as Fred, who is off to explore the world, using his newfound ability to refold himself into other shapes.

Cute, harmless, and kid-friendly, it includes storybook elements and voice narration. Game can be completed in one sitting with bonus items and unlockable skins for repeat play. Gameplay grows more challenging between levels, but should be approachable for younger audiences.

Donate if you can, otherwise enjoy and share with your friends!

If you play it in a stream, post it here in comments!
